comment.body:
>  people finding that the content they upload is getting taken down for "copyright infringement" they will either switch to a VPN or using hidden services like ZeroNet or TOR for spreading things such as memes.

I'm afraid the next step might be to ban VPN and Tor. Fortunately, ZeroNet can theoretically work with any transport, even through floppy disks :) 

I started "social networking" in the FIDO era in the mid-1990s, when e-mail from Europe to Russia took 3-4 days :) I'm Afraid we can go back to this time and will remember the beginning of the 2000s as an era of unprecedented information freedom.
